actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 in order to provide authority to assist training of disadvantaged students for the legal profession.
subjects: Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: Provides authority to the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare, under the Higher Education Act of 1965, to assist in the training of disadvantaged students for the legal profession. Specifies the costs coverable by grants made pursuant to the authority conferred by this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 in order to provide authority to assist training of disadvantaged students for the legal profession.
